LightningComponentBundle.description: Displays Data Cloud records using Data Graphs on Unified Individual record pages

property.name: graphName
property.label: Graph Name
property.description: API name of the Data Graph to query (e.g., CustomerEngagementGraph)

property.name: rootDmo
property.label: Root DMO
property.description: Root DMO to query from without __dll suffix (e.g., EngagementEvent)

property.name: selectFields
property.label: Select Fields
property.description: Comma-separated list of fields to query (e.g., EventType__c, EventDate__c, Channel__c)

property.name: columnConfig
property.label: Column Configuration (JSON)
property.description: Optional JSON array for custom column configuration. Leave blank for auto-generation.

property.name: title
property.label: Card Title
property.description: Title to display on the component card

property.name: maxRows
property.label: Max Rows
property.description: Maximum number of rows to display
